content: Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings to specify the allowed mail servers to use for self-registration.

comment.text: Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings to specify allowed mail servers for self-registration. This setting is used to describe a security category in a portal settings page and appears as part of the "Trusted Mail" section, likely on a button or link labeled "Save To Apply".

usage.context:
<Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="700">
 {t("TrustedMail")}
 </Text>
 <div className="category-item-description">
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("TrustedMailSettingDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="SaveToApply" />
 </Text>
 {trustedMailDomainSettingsUrl ? (

return (
 <MainContainer>
 <LearnMoreWrapper withoutExternalLink={!trustedMailDomainSettingsUrl}>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("TrustedMailSettingDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400" className="learn-subtitle">
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="SaveToApply" />
 </Text>
 {trustedMailDomainSettingsUrl ? (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "للمستخدم" (lilmustakhdim) which translates to "for the user" is unnecessary and adds redundancy. The English original doesn't specify the registration is for a user, it's just self-registration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تهيئة إعدادات نطاق البريد الموثوق لتحديد خوادم البريد المسموحة للتسجيل الذاتي.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Configure" is overly literal and clunky. A more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etibarlı Poçt Domenləri üçün parametrləri ayarlayın (Adjust Trusted Mail Domains settings).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Özünü qeydiyyat üçün istifadə edilməsinə icazə verilən" is complex and could be simplified. It literally means "to be used for self-registration".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Öz-qeydiyyatda istifadə edilə bilən

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Etibarlı Poçt Domen Parametrlərini konfiqurasiya edin" could benefit from a more fluid sentence structure. Splitting the sentence could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etibarlı Poçt Domenləri üçün parametrləri ayarlayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a long sentence structure that can be improved for readability. The phrase "за да уточните разрешените сървъри за електронна поща, които да използвате за само-регистрация" is quite lengthy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигурирайте Настройките за Доверен Мейл Домейн, за да определите разрешените имейл сървъри за само-регистрация.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "Settings" is missing in the Greek translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διαμορφώστε τις Ρυθμίσεις: αξιόπιστου τομέα αλληλογραφίας για να καθορίσετε τους επιτρεπόμενους διακομιστές αλληλογραφίας που θα χρησιμοποιούνται για την αυτοεγγραφή.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'self-registration' is not accurately translated. 'Autorregistro' is a less common and potentially confusing term. A more natural and understandable translation would be 'registro automático' or 'registro propio'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure los ajustes de dominio de correo de confianza para especificar los servidores de correo permitidos que se utilizarán para el registro automático.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Luotetun sähköpostin toimialueen asetukset" is a bit verbose and potentially unclear. A more natural phrasing might be "Luotettujen sähköpostitoimialueiden asetukset" or a shorter alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Määritä Luotettujen sähköpostitoimialueiden asetukset

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'joita käytetään itse-rekisteröintiin' can be simplified to 'itse rekisteröintiin'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: joita käytetään itse rekisteröintiin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "à utiliser pour l'auto-enregistrement" is a slightly awkward translation of "to use for self-registration". It's literally 'to use for self-registration'. A more natural phrasing would be something like "pour l'auto-inscription".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurez les paramètres du domaine de messagerie de confiance pour spécifier les serveurs de messagerie autorisés pour l'auto-inscription.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Վստահելի փոստի Դոմենի կարգավորումները" is a literal translation of "Trusted Mail Domain Settings" but might be improved for natural flow in Armenian. A more idiomatic phrasing might be "վստահելի էլեկտրոնային փոստի դոմենների կարգավորումները" or similar, to better convey the meaning of "Trusted Mail Domain Settings".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing as "վստահելի էլեկտրոնային փոստի դոմենների կարգավորումները" or a similarly natural-sounding equivalent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "որպեսզի նշեք փոստի թույլատրելի սերվերները" could be more accurately translated as something conveying 'to specify which mail servers are allowed'. The current wording implies a directive rather than a specification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing as "զորպեսզի նշեք թույլատրելի էլեկտրոնային փոստի սերվերները" or similar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "autoregistrazione" is a less common and slightly technical term. A more natural translation of 'self-registration' in this context might be 'registrazione diretta' or 'registrazione autonoma'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configura le impostazioni del dominio di posta affidabile per specificare i server di posta consentiti da utilizzare per la registrazione diretta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings" is somewhat awkwardly translated as "信頼できるメールドメインを構成して". A more natural translation might be something like "信頼できるメールドメインの設定を構成して" (Shinrai dekiru meerudo main no sosete o kouchiku shite) or simply "信頼できるメールドメインの設定をします" (Shinrai dekiru meerudo main no sosete o shimasu). The current translation is technically correct but less fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 信頼できるメールドメインの設定を構成して (Shinrai dekiru meerudo main no sosete o kouchiku shite) or 信頼できるメールドメインの設定をします (Shinrai dekiru meerudo main no sosete o shimasu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໂດເມນ' (domain) seems to be used incorrectly. It should probably be 'ໂດເມນອີເມລ' (email domain) for better clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັ້ງຄ່າການຕັ້ງຄ່າໂດເມນອີເມລທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ສໍາລັບການລົງທະບຽນດ້ວຍຕົນເອງ' is grammatically correct but a bit lengthy. Consider a more concise alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສໍາລັບການລົງທະບຽນດ້ວຍຕົນເອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'autorregistro' while technically meaning 'self-registration,' is not commonly used in Brazilian Portuguese and sounds awkward. It's better to use a more natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina as configurações de domínio de correio confiável para especificar os servidores de correio permitidos para registro próprio.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the flow could be improved for clarity. The sentence structure is a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure as configurações de domínio de correio confiável para especificar os servidores de correio permitidos para registro próprio.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'autorregistro' while technically correct, is not the most natural or common way to express 'self-registration' in Brazilian Portuguese. It's somewhat formal and less frequently used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure as configurações de domínio de e-mail confiável para especificar os servidores de e-mail permitidos para registro próprio.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'e-mail confiável' is better than 'correio confiável'. 'Correio' is a more general term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure as configurações de domínio de e-mail confiável para especificar os servidores de e-mail permitidos para registro próprio.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "severe de e-mail" is incorrect. It should be "servere de e-mail".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setările domeniului de e-mail de încredere pentru a indica serverele de e-mail pe care le utilizați pentru autoînregistrarea utilizatorilor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'self-registration' is awkward.  A more natural phrasing would be 'înregistrare automata'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setările domeniului de e-mail de încredere pentru a indica serverele de e-mail pe care le utilizați pentru înregistrare automata.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'විශ්වසන තැපැල් වසම්' (vishvasana thapael wasam) for 'Trusted Mail Domain' is not the most natural or commonly used phrasing. 'විශ්වසිත තැපැල් වසම' (vishvasitha thapael wasama) or 'නమ్మනීය තැපැල් වසම' (nammanyeiya thapael wasama) would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'විශ්වසිත තැපැල් වසම' or 'නమ్మනීය තැපැල් වසම' instead of 'විශ්වසන තැපැල් වසම්'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'වින්‍යාස කරන්න' (vinayas karanawa) for 'Configure' is grammatically correct but sounds slightly formal and could be softened. 'අ mengatur කරන්න' (ath karannava) or 'සකස් කරන්න' (sakas karanawa) are more common and less formal alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'අ mengatur කරන්න' or 'සකස් කරන්න' instead of 'වින්‍යාස කරන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Nakonfigurujte' (Configure) appears to be a Serbian word, not Slovak. The Slovak equivalent is 'Konfigurujte'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurujte nastavenia dôveryhodnej poštovej domény a zadajte povolené poštové servery, ktoré sa môžu použiť na samo registráciu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'samo registráciu' is not grammatically correct in Slovak. It should be 'samoregistráciu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurujte nastavenia dôveryhodnej poštovej domény a zadajte povolené poštové servery, ktoré sa môžu použiť na samoregistráciu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'поузданих' (pouzdaniх) is a grammatically correct form but might be slightly less common than 'сигурних' (sigurnih) when referring to trusted domains in a technical context. While not strictly incorrect, 'сигурних' could improve readability and feel more natural to a Serbian speaker familiar with IT terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигуришите подешавања сигурних поштанских домена да одредите дозвољене сервере поште за саморегистрацију.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Konfigurišite' is a formal command form. A more natural and user-friendly option would be to use the imperative form appropriate for settings configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišanje

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Turkish. 'Kendi kendine kayıt' (self-registration) is a bit clunky. 'Öz kayıt' or simply 'kayıt' would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Self-registration is better translated as 'kayıt' or 'öz kayıt' depending on the desired level of formality.  A better translation would be: 'Kayıt için kullanılmasına izin verilen posta sunucularını belirtmek üzere Güvenilir Posta Alanı Ayarlarını yapılandırın.' or 'Öz kayıt için kullanılmasına izin verilen posta sunucularını belirlemek üzere Güvenilir Posta Alanı Ayarlarını yapılandırın.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and complex for user interface text. It could be broken down for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider splitting the sentence into two: 'Güvenilir Posta Alanı Ayarlarını yapılandırın. Bu ayarlar, kendi kendine kayıt için kullanılabilecek posta sunucularını belirtmenizi sağlar.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Trusted Mail Domain" is a bit literal. A more natural translation might be "Tên miền thư đáng tin cậy" or "Tên miền email đáng tin cậy". "Thư Tin cậy" is understandable, but less common and potentially unclear to a wider audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tên miền thư đáng tin cậy

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'đăng ký' is spelled correctly, but consider if 'đăng ký' or 'tự đăng ký' is more appropriate in this context. 'Tự đăng ký' is more accurate to the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tự đăng ký

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "通过“配置受信任的邮件域设置”" is awkward and overly verbose. It directly translates the English UI element name instead of conveying the meaning.  A more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 配置允许用于自注册的邮件服务器。
